summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5969 for the improvement of East Spruce Street from East Alder Street to 300 feet west thereof; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79752, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
